def-en: In the context of a knowledge graph, a schema that describes the logical structure of the graph (such as which relations are transitive or symmetric).
def-ga: I gcomhthéacs graif eolais, scéimre a chuireann in iúl struchtúr loighce an ghraif chéanna (m.sh. cé acu na ceangail atá aistreach nó siméadrach).
notes: Téarma ar fáil leis an mbrí chéanna sna foclóirí thuas.
